long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate Your Crafting Experience with Auto Craft

"Auto Craft" is your ultimate companion for automating crafting in pixels. Designed to streamline repetitive actions, this Chrome extension empowers players to focus on the fun aspects of gaming while it handles the mundane.

Key Features:

Draggable Dashboard: Enjoy a user-friendly dashboard that can be positioned anywhere on your screen, giving you quick access to controls.

Craft Selection: Choose from a variety of crafts seamlessly integrated into the dashboard, allowing you to automate crafting processes with ease.

Customizable Delay: Set the automation speed with a customizable delay feature, ensuring actions are performed at your preferred pace.

Status Updates: Stay informed with real-time status updates on whether the script is running or stopped, ensuring you're always in control.

Teleport buttons: teleport to Terravila and your speck island easily with our integrated features.

Privacy and Efficiency:

"Auto Craft" respects your privacy by operating locally on your browser without collecting personal data. It optimizes performance by running scripts only when initiated by the user, minimizing impact on system resources.

Get Started:

Enhance your gaming experience with "Auto Craft" today. Automate crafting, optimize your gameplay, and focus on what matters most â€” having fun!
